title: Dev returns 404 instead of 422 when ValueSet not found for $expand
notes: Prod returns HTTP 422 with issue code 'unknown' and details.text. Dev returns HTTP 404 with issue code 'not-found' and diagnostics. Exact same pattern as described in the bug.

title: Dev returns 400 instead of 422 for error responses across validate-code and expand operations
notes: Prod returns HTTP 422 for validate-code error (ValueSet not found). Dev returns HTTP 400 for the same error. Both return OperationOutcome with matching error semantics (issue code 'not-found', same details text). Status code difference is exactly as described.

title: Dev returns result=false for valid v3 terminology codes in ValueSet $validate-code
notes: Tested consent-category ValueSet with code INFA from v3-ActCode. Prod returns result=true, dev returns result=false. The v3 hierarchy resolution bug (subsumedBy property not matched by URI) still causes dev to miss descendant codes.

title: Dev loads different versions of HL7 terminology CodeSystems (terminology.hl7.org) than prod
notes: Two manifestations confirmed: (1) v3-TribalEntityUS ValueSet version is 4.0.0 on prod vs 2018-08-12 on dev, with different name/title/date metadata. (2) observation-category CodeSystem version is 4.0.1 on prod vs 2.0.0 on dev. The version skew pattern persists across multiple HL7 terminology resources.

title: Dev returns only root concept for v3 hierarchical ValueSets (missing child codes)
notes: Expanded v3-PurposeOfUse ValueSet. Prod returns total=63 with 63 codes (root + 62 descendants). Dev returns total=1 with only the root abstract concept. Dev still fails to resolve the subsumedBy-based hierarchy in v3 CodeSystems.

title: Dev: missing valueset-unclosed extension and spurious expansion.total on incomplete expansions
notes: SNOMED CT is-a 404684003 expand with count=1000. Prod returns 1000 codes with valueset-unclosed=true extension and no total. Dev returns 1000 codes with total=124412 and no unclosed extension. Both patterns (missing unclosed, spurious total) still co-occur exactly as described.

title: Dev adds expression field on informational OperationOutcome issues where prod omits it
notes: CodeSystem/$validate-code for UCUM code=TEST. Prod's informational issue has no expression field (null). Dev's informational issue has expression=['code']. The extra expression field on info-severity issues is still present.

title: Dev returns extra message/issues for display language resolution on validate-code result=true
notes: POST validate-code for iso:3166 code FR with displayLanguage=fr. Both return result=true. Prod has no message parameter. Dev returns extra message: 'There are no valid display names found for the code urn:iso:std:iso:3166#FR for language(s) fr'. Dev still emits the spurious display-not-found informational message that prod omits.

title: Dev omits system/code/version/display params on CodeSystem/$validate-code with codeableConcept containing unknown system
notes: Prod HTTP 200, Dev HTTP 200. Prod returns system/code/version/display params for the known LOINC coding plus 2 OperationOutcome issues. Dev returns no system/code/version/display params and only 1 issue. Pattern unchanged.

title: Dev omits expansion.total when prod includes it
notes: Prod HTTP 200, Dev HTTP 200. Prod total: 5099, Dev total: missing (null). Both return 1000 contains entries. Dev still omits expansion.total on paged expansions.

title: Dev omits valueset-toocostly extension and adds spurious used-codesystem for grammar-based code systems
notes: Prod HTTP 200, Dev HTTP 200. Prod has valueset-toocostly extension: true, Dev: false. Prod used-codesystem count: 0, Dev: 1 (urn:ietf:bcp:13). Both differences co-occur as described in the bug.

title: Dev returns extra informational HGVS syntax issue in $validate-code for varnomen.hgvs.org
notes: Prod HTTP 200, Dev HTTP 200. Prod issue count: 1, Dev issue count: 2. Dev still includes extra informational issue with text 'Missing one of c, g, m, n, p, r followed by .' in details.text.

title: Dev returns 404 for SNOMED CT implicit ValueSet (fhir_vs URLs)
notes: Prod HTTP 200 with valid expansion containing SNOMED concepts, Dev HTTP 404 with OperationOutcome 'ValueSet not found: http://snomed.info/sct?fhir_vs'. Dev still does not recognize fhir_vs implicit ValueSet URL pattern.

title: Prod HGVS timeout: prod=500 due to external service timeout, comparison invalid
notes: Prod HTTP 500 with 'Error parsing HGVS response: Read timed out.' Dev HTTP 200 with result=false. The prod external HGVS service timeout is still occurring consistently on multiple retries. This transient condition persists and would still taint any data collection run.

title: Dev message parameter omits issue texts when validating CodeableConcept with multiple coding errors
notes: Prod HTTP 200, Dev HTTP 200. Prod message contains 2 semicolon-separated error texts (SNOMED unknown code + GenomicClinicalIndication unknown code). Dev message contains only 1 (SNOMED unknown code). Both have identical 3 OperationOutcome issues. Dev still fails to concatenate all issue texts into message param.

title: Dev loads older SNOMED CT edition than prod, causing different code sets
notes: SNOMED International edition is now aligned (both use 20250201). However, US edition (VSAC ValueSets) still shows version skew: prod uses 20250901, dev uses 20250301. Code sets differ: VSAC 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1240.3 returns 4 codes on prod vs 5 on dev (184115007 only in dev). The pattern of SNOMED edition version skew persists for US edition.

title: Dev returns 400 error instead of 200 toocostly expansion for grammar-based code systems
notes: Prod returns HTTP 200 with toocostly=true ValueSet for BCP-47 expand. Dev returns HTTP 400 with OperationOutcome code=too-costly. Same pattern as originally reported.

title: Dev returns 200 expansion instead of 422 too-costly for large code systems (LOINC, MIME types)
notes: Prod returns HTTP 422 with OperationOutcome too-costly for LOINC expand. Dev returns HTTP 200 with 1000 LOINC codes (paginated). Same pattern as originally reported.

title: Dev validate-code result=false for SNOMED codes valid in prod due to older SNOMED edition
notes: SNOMED version skew still present: prod uses 20250201, dev uses 20240201. The specific repro code 39154008 now returns result=true on both servers, but the underlying version skew pattern persists. Other codes validated against hierarchy-based ValueSets could still produce result disagreements due to the edition difference.

title: Dev returns 400 ValueSet-not-found for validate-code requests that prod handles successfully (10 records)
notes: Prod returns HTTP 200 with result=true for @all ValueSet validate-code. Dev returns HTTP 400 with OperationOutcome: 'A definition for the value Set http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/@all could not be found'. Same pattern as originally reported.

title: Dev returns SQLITE_MISUSE error on RxNorm-related $expand requests
notes: Both servers return HTTP 500. Prod returns 'fdb_sqlite3_objects error: no such column: cui1'. Dev returns 'SQLITE_MISUSE: not an error'. Same pattern of different SQLite error messages as originally reported.

title: Dev loads older SNOMED CT and CPT editions, causing expand contains[].version to differ
notes: Both return 200 with 280 codes. Prod has SNOMED version 20250901 and CPT 2026. Dev has SNOMED version 20250301 and CPT 2025. Same version skew pattern as originally reported, though the specific version numbers have changed (SNOMED prod was 20250901, now still 20250901; dev was 20250301, still 20250301).

title: validate-code: dev renders null status as literal 'null' in inactive concept message
notes: Prod message: 'has a status of  and its use should be reviewed' (empty string). Dev message: 'has a status of null and its use should be reviewed' (literal 'null'). Identical to original report.

title: Dev returns 200 instead of 422 for validate-code with code but no system parameter
notes: Prod returns HTTP 422 with OperationOutcome 'Unable to find code to validate'. Dev returns HTTP 200 with result=true, system=https://www.usps.com/, code=TX, display=Texas. Dev incorrectly infers system from ValueSet. Same pattern as originally reported.

title: Dev uses R5-style property instead of R4 extension for deprecated status in expand contains
notes: Confirmed. For patient-contactrelationship, prod annotates 4 deprecated codes with R5 backport extension and dev omits them entirely (dev returns 11 codes vs prod 12). For security-labels, prod uses R5 backport extension on 17 deprecated codes while dev uses R5-native property elements on 8 codes. The expansion-level property declaration extension is present in prod but absent in dev for patient-contactrelationship. The pattern of inconsistent deprecated status representation persists.

title: Dev omits retired status-check informational issues in validate-code OperationOutcome
notes: Confirmed. Prod returns 3 issues including an informational status-check issue ('Reference to retired ValueSet http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActUSPrivacyLaw|3.0.0') while dev returns only 2 error-level issues (not-found and not-in-vs), omitting the retired status-check informational issue entirely.

title: Dev SNOMED lookup returns URI-based name and omits most properties
notes: Confirmed. For SNOMED code 446050000: prod returns name='SNOMED CT' with properties inactive, copyright, moduleId, normalForm, normalFormTerse, parent. Dev returns name='http://snomed.info/sct|http://snomed.info/sct/900000000000207008/version/20250201' with only the inactive property. All three differences (name, missing properties, display as FSN vs synonym) persist.

title: SNOMED $lookup: dev returns Synonym designation use type where prod returns Inactive
notes: Confirmed. For SNOMED code 303071001, the designation 'People in the family' has use.code=73425007 (Inactive) in prod but use.code=900000000000013009 (Synonym) in dev. Prod correctly marks this inactive description while dev treats it as a regular synonym.

title: Dev crashes (500) on GET expand with filter parameter: searchText.toLowerCase is not a function
notes: Confirmed. Prod returns HTTP 200 for expand with filter=referr on participant-role. Dev returns HTTP 500 with OperationOutcome error 'searchText.toLowerCase is not a function'. The JavaScript TypeError crash on filter parameter processing persists.

title: Dev returns expansion codes when prod marks expansion as too-costly (both HTTP 200)
notes: Confirmed. For the Brazilian ValueSet (exame-imagem-laudo-conclusion-code) expand POST: prod returns HTTP 200 with total=0, contains=0, toocostly=True, limitedExpansion=True. Dev returns HTTP 200 with total=None, contains=1000, toocostly=False, limitedExpansion=True. Dev proceeds with the expansion that prod considers too costly.

title: GET /r5/CodeSystem/$subsumes returns 400 despite valid system parameter
notes: Confirmed. Prod returns HTTP 400 with OperationOutcome 'No CodeSystem Identified (need a system parameter, or execute the operation on a CodeSystem resource)' despite system=http://snomed.info/sct being present in the URL. Dev returns HTTP 200 with Parameters containing outcome=subsumed-by. Prod fails to recognize the system query parameter on R5 GET $subsumes.

title: validate-code: dev renders JavaScript undefined/null as literal strings when code/version absent
notes: Prod returns message with empty strings for missing code/version ("Unknown code '' in ... version ''"), dev returns 'undefined' for code ("Unknown code 'undefined' in ..."). Dev message format changed slightly (no longer includes "version 'null'" -- now omits version entirely with message-id Unknown_Code_in instead of Unknown_Code_in_Version), but the core pattern of rendering JavaScript undefined as a literal string persists. Dev also still includes the extra 'Empty code' informational issue.

title: LOINC $lookup: dev returns extra designations, RELATEDNAMES2 properties, and different CLASSTYPE format
notes: All three differences confirmed: (1) Dev includes preferredForLanguage designation that prod omits while prod has duplicate LONG_COMMON_NAME. (2) Dev CLASSTYPE has value '1' with description 'Laboratory class' vs prod's single value 'Laboratory class'. (3) Dev returns 14 RELATEDNAMES2 properties with language-specific related names; prod returns 0. LOINC version is now 2.81 on both servers.

title: validate-code: prod reports UNKNOWN_CODESYSTEM, dev reports UNKNOWN_CODESYSTEM_VERSION when system-version pins unavailable SNOMED edition
notes: Prod returns message-id UNKNOWN_CODESYSTEM ('A definition for CodeSystem http://snomed.info/sct could not be found'), dev returns UNKNOWN_CODESYSTEM_VERSION with a list of valid versions. Dev also includes version-qualified x-caused-by-unknown-system. Both use SNOMED version 20250201. The pattern is identical to the original bug report.

title: SNOMED $lookup: prod returns 400 where dev returns 404 for unknown code
notes: Prod returns HTTP 400 with issue code 'invalid' and message in 'diagnostics'. Dev returns HTTP 404 with issue code 'not-found' and message in 'details.text'. Both reference SNOMED version 20250201. Pattern is exactly as described in the bug.

title: expand: dev returns 404 for unknown ISO 3166 version that prod resolves by fallback
notes: Prod returns HTTP 200 with 249 country codes (falling back to version 2018). Dev now returns HTTP 422 (was 404 in original report) with OperationOutcome: 'A definition for CodeSystem urn:iso:std:iso:3166 version 2020 could not be found... Valid versions: 2018 or 20210120'. Core pattern persists: prod gracefully falls back, dev rejects. HTTP status changed from 404 to 422 on dev.

title: validate-code: dev returns result=false for ISO 3166 user-assigned code AA that prod considers valid
notes: Both servers now return identical responses: result=true, version=2018, display='User-assigned'. Dev now recognizes ISO 3166 code AA as valid, matching prod. The bug appears to have been fixed on the dev server.

title: validate-code: dev renders empty status in INACTIVE_DISPLAY_FOUND message where prod shows 'inactive'
notes: Prod shows '(status = inactive)' in the INACTIVE_DISPLAY_FOUND message, dev shows '(status = )' with empty string. Secondary difference also persists: dev lists all synonyms (Oral route,Per os,Oral route (qualifier value),...) while prod shows only the preferred term in quotes. Both use SNOMED version 20250201.
